name: Blue: Caretaker
description:
You find yourself in a strange and barren place, the only thing you see is snow. But there's an old lady living there. It'd be fun hanging out with her.

Began in the Holiday jam, ended in the 32-bit Spring Cleaning.

Thank y'all so much for the opportunities!

While there is only 'one' ending, there are differences in dialogues at the end depending on your choice. Choose wisely!

-=-=-=-

哎吔吔, this game took me the longest to make despite being quite short. Which, if I'm being serious, is due to procrastination. Just procrastination. So joining this jam gives me some motivation and will to finish something, and here I am.

That's all I have to say. Enjoy this short game!

P/S: 5 last images are the prejam version.
